alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 1:04PM EDT until March 28 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Southern Erie county. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds of 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph are expected. Wind chill values will fall into the single digits at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
